dialogue: Hi girls, Annette. Nice to see you.
I just brought it because-- well it’s funny-- when I was on Siegfried and Roy, those guys had us over on off days and-- and they went pretty hard on the red wine...
Yeah... was ages ago. There was this one time I got caught in the escape trap with the white tiger.

Well, the white tiger is supposed to disappear off the stage, right? During his trick. And when I open the escape door on the floor of the stage, the tiger knows to go through a tunnel, and into a holding pen. But somehow... I got caught in the holding pen. With the white tiger. Man, I was shitting with fear.
That is insane!! Did the tiger swat at you?
Eddie, you okay? I swallowed a teeny fish bone, did you too?
No, no. Um, listen so, I didn’t come here tonight just to um-- uh, I need to tell you something.
